```{r setup, include = FALSE}
options(stringsAsFactors = FALSE)


### Load packages and functions
library(here)
library(tidyverse)
library(sessioninfo)
library(kableExtra)
library(knitr)

bootstrap <- function(x) {
  if (is_html_output()) {
    kable_styling(
      kable_input = x,
      bootstrap_options = c("striped", "hover", "condensed", "responsive", "bordered"),
      full_width = TRUE
    )
  } else {
    x
  }
}


### Set knitr rmarkdown chunk options
output_directory <- file.path(params[["working_directory"]], params[["script_name"]])
dir.create(path = output_directory, recursive = TRUE, showWarnings = FALSE, mode = "0777")
opts_chunk$set(
  results = "asis",
  include = TRUE,
  echo = FALSE,
  warning = FALSE,
  message = FALSE,
  dpi = params[["dpi"]],
  tidy = FALSE,
  crop = TRUE,
  autodep = TRUE,
  fig.align = "center"
)


### Define theme
theme_set(theme_light(base_size = params[["gg_fontsize"]]))
```
